title: Quell Gaming new recruiting upcoming players
body:
Quell Gaming is a new team starting up looking to practice and dedicate ourselves to becoming a threat in the Oceanic scene and become apart of the OPL.

We are currently looking for upcoming players who are looking to push themselves to the next level. We aim to forge together and move as a team into the apex of the scene. 

Minimum requirement:
Plat+
17+
Working headset
Ability to use Teamspeak 3
4+ hours of time for practice daily
Mature

Please contact Gaylord (coach) regarding applications and other potential interests.

replies.body:
I'm bronze because I've been on tilt a lot was silver and main adc would really love for you guys to test me out please I'm better then I am ranked kinda gave up let me know 
My IGN is GriffoMate
Are you part of this team?
Always been tempted to see what all the fuss is about with Pumah
Yeah come see what all the fuss is about!

Whoever is reading this, please consider your options. This guy told me to start a mana crystal on ezreal bot lane adc because it scales into a tear faster....................................... If you believe that is the next level then by all means join up and welcome his logic :)
